alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 6:04AM CST until February 20 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas...Missouri... Saint Francis River near Saint Francis For the Saint Francis River...including Saint Francis, Lake City, Madison...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Saint Francis River near Saint Francis. * WHEN...Through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Several roads near Wilhelmina, Missouri are flooded. Recreational areas and large areas of agricultural land near the river are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 22.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:00 AM CST Friday was 22.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest around 23 feet later this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
